posts.title: Compact Packable Backpack
posts.content: The ingenious design of this backpack lets you travel light while still providing enough room for all your gear. This 24 liter pack comes with a waterproof main compartment and can fold up so tightly that it will actually fit in your hands.

posts.title: Transparent Window Bird Feeder
posts.content: Enjoy bird watching from the comfort of your living room couch by hanging this transparent window bird feeder right outside your home. It boasts a series of suction cups so that you can conveniently attach it to any window and see it from any part of your home.

posts.title: Hidden Middle Finger Coffee Mug
posts.content: Make your coffee breaks a little more fun by sipping your brew from this hidden middle finger coffee mug. As soon as you begin sipping your java, the middle finger at the mug’s base becomes visible so that you can discreetly flip off everyone that comes your way.

posts.title: Star Wars AT-AT Tape Dispenser
posts.content: Add some out-of-this-world charm to your drab workspace by setting this Star Wars AT-AT tape dispenser on your desk. The clever design disguises this functional accessory to look like an AT-AT that’s been taken down by Rebel scum!

posts.title: Haircut Umbrella
posts.content: Now you can easily catch loose hair trimmings and degrade your child all at the same time with this wonderful haircut umbrella! Perfect for giving haircuts without the hair dropping on the floor, this haircut umbrella will ensure your children will resent you for the rest of your life.

posts.title: PiViT Ladder Leveling Tool
posts.content: Minimize the risk of serious injury when you’re hanging something over your home’s staircase with the PiVit ladder leveling tool. It’s fully adjustable and sports extra grippy feet ideal for smooth surfaces in addition to a large non-slip surface so your ladder remains in place.

posts.title: Adjustable Computer Arm/Wrist Rest
posts.content: Minimize arm, shoulder, and neck pain while working long hours in front of your computer using this adjustable arm/wrist rest. It easily clamps onto most desks and chairs to provide you with a comfortable and padded place to rest your arm while your work.

posts.title: Super Mario Bros. Magnet Set
posts.content: Geek up your kitchen atmosphere by recreating a level from your favorite game using this Super Mario Bros. magnet set. The set includes 80 Super Mario themed magnets – each shaped like a different character or model in the iconic game.

posts.title: Mini Guitar Amplifier
posts.content: If you need to rock out while traveling, the one watt, .34 pound mini amplifier is the right piece of gear for you. It makes your death metal jams sound totally sweet without the fuss and muss of a twenty pound amp. Your mom will be so glad you brought it with you at Christmas.

posts.title: Darth Maul Lightsaber Lamp
posts.content: Everyone loves lightsabers, and now you can light up your bedroom ironically with the power of the dark side! These wall mounting double sided Darth Maul lightsaber lamps are a perfect accessory to a kid’s room, or for a geeky game room.

posts.title: Charcoal Candy Canes
posts.content: Let those little rascals know they were naughty without actually ruining their Christmas by placing these charcoal candy canes in their stockings. The set comes with six dark “charcoal” candy canes that taste like smoke, cinnamon, and bitter disappointment.

posts.title: Instant Ice Cream Maker
posts.content: Whip up delicious frozen treats in just 10 minutes using this instant ice cream maker. Available in a range of vibrant colors, it requires no electricity and allows you to make both soft serve and hard ice cream in nearly any flavor imaginable.
